title: Nutella Swirl Cupcakes
content:
Nutella Swirl Cupcakes

My son, Nehal, loves Nutella and so do I. :) The other day while leaving home for school, he asked me to make something with Nutella. I asked, "How about cupcakes with Nutella?" He gave me a gleeful look and got into the car bidding me goodbye. It took me 40 minutes to prepare and bake the warm and aromatic Nutella swirl cupcakes. The house smelled heavenly when he got home and the sight of the cupcakes cooling on the wire rack ensured a tight hug and kiss for Mommy! :)

Nutella Swirl Cupcakes ~ Cupcakes recipe that is easy to make

These cupcakes are a breeze to make. Though it sounds exotic, it is one of those cupcake recipes that is easy to make with everyday ingredients available at home. Nutella is the main star player that elevates the flavor of the cupcake. The self frosted Nutella swirl turns an ordinary cupcake into an special one.
